name: Spark Up
description:
It's a Game made by some students for a Week JAM.

You're a spark from a fire that should reach the top of the chimney to escape.

You must play with :

XBox 360 Controller

XBox One Controller

DS4 Controller

There is also a Multiplayer Mode.

Enjoy it!

Tell us your reviews about how the game looks like for you.

And we will be very grateful if you collabore and donate a small tip for help us keep on doing games like this, and better ones !
